messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

password expired sent monday december password expired dear please conversation bellow we have test users active directory used for testing could you be kind check if their passwords were expired if please set passwords for users integration password pass integration prod password th kind regards engineer en sent monday december re password expired hi for users integration password pass integration prod password th problem persist thanks for your help senior developer sent monday december re password expired looping still issue thank you head sent monday december re password expired hello could anyone please confirm problem still exists kind regards engineer en sent thursday december re password expired hi guys looping guys well question integration thanks head sent thursday december password expired hi today tried access but when attempt authenticate receive screen anything but inform you because can affect someone work best regards senior developer

message.reasoning:
